allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add SUA management and replace TinyMCE with Summernote

- Add Special Use Airspace \(SUA\) activation management page
- Add SUA API endpoints for activations, TFR creation, and management
- Add database migration for SUA activations table
- Replace TinyMCE editor with Summernote for better Bootstrap integration
- Add SUA link to navigation menu

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Discord bot integration for bidirectional messaging

- Add DiscordAPI class for REST API operations \(messages, reactions, channels\)
- Add DiscordWebhookHandler for real-time event processing with Ed25519 verification
- Add DiscordMessageParser for TMI/advisory content extraction
- Create API endpoints: messages, reactions, webhook, channels, announcements
- Add database migration for Discord tables \(messages, reactions, sent_messages, webhook_log\)
- Refactor api/nod/discord.php to use new service layer
- Update config.example.php with Discord configuration template

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(" with <10 coords\)
- Add boundary layer controls \(ARTCC, Superhigh, High, Low, TRACON\)
- Track and report 156 features with polygon closures fixed
- Add TYPE_COLORS for proper per-type coloring

Closed features include:
- R-2303A, R-5107B \(Restricted\)
- JACKAL, LAUGHLIN, OUTLAW, SYRACUSE, YANKEE MOAs
- Fort Bliss THAAD, WSMR THAAD areas
- Various Warning areas \(W-105A, W-106A, W-106B\)

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix demand page to show live ADL demand with COALESCE fallback

Use COALESCE\(eta_runway_utc, eta_utc\) and COALESCE\(etd_runway_utc, etd_utc\)
to include flights that only have general ETA/ETD populated. Changed INNER
JOIN to LEFT JOIN on adl_flight_times to include flights without time
records. This ensures demand visualization shows all flights with any
available time estimate.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
